body: You're trying to add 3 materials to a single surface all together. The last one (glass_mat) is the material that should be connected to the surface. For the other two add them to the library and radiance/honeybee should call them during the run. [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Perforated_mesh&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0) is an example.
